statement.tex: \text{If }\ora{a}=\vector{x}{2}{-z}\text{ and }\ora{b}=\vector{3}{-y}{1} \\ \text{are two equal vectors, then write the value of } \\ x+y+z.

step.reason: \begin{align} \ora{a}&=\vector{x}{2}{-z} \\ \ora{b}&=\vector{3}{-y}{1} \\ \end{align} \\ \text{Since $\ora{a}=\ora{b}$, comparing coefficients of $\hat i$, $\hat j$} \\ \text{and $\hat k$ we get, }\bf x=3, y=-2, z=-1
